mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( board_code, title, div, contents, id, nickname, read_cnt, reg_dt, reg_id, mod_dt, mod_id ) SELECT BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '제목' || LEVEL, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL, 2), 1, '10', '20'), -- div 추가 '내용' || LEVEL, 'user' || LEVEL, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL,2),1,'admin','james'), 0, SYSDATE - LEVEL, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL,2),1,'admin','james'), SYSDATE - LEVEL, DECODE(MOD(LEVEL,2),1,'admin','james') FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 100
mapper.select: SELECT board_code, title, div, contents, id, nickname, read_cnt, reg_dt, reg_id, mod_dt, mod_id FROM board WHERE board_code = #{boardCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, div = #{div}, contents = #{contents}, mod_dt = SYSDATE, mod_id = #{modId} WHERE board_code = #{boardCode}
